parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)
parameters.label: ☁️ Subscription

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.label: 🗂️ Workspace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' 
//| where subscriptionId == '{Subscription:id}'
| project id

parameters.name: SentinelPrice
parameters.label: Sentinel Price
parameters.description: Enter a value for Sentinel Data cost, default: 4.38

parameters.name: Price
parameters.label: Ingestion Price
parameters.description: Enter your ingestion price per GB (PAYG or Commitment Tier). You can also refer to Azure Pricing Calculator.

parameters.name: TotalE5Seats
parameters.label: Total seats (E5/A5/F5/G5)
parameters.description: Enter the total number of Microsoft 365 E5, A5, F5, G5 and Microsoft 365 E5, A5, F5, G5 Security licenses in your environment

parameters.name: retentionDays
parameters.label: How many days retention are required? Defaults to current setting
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' 
| where id has "{Workspace}"
| extend retentionDays = trim(' ', tostring(properties.retentionInDays))
| project retentionDays

parameters.name: Retention
parameters.label: Retention price per GB
parameters.description: Obtain a value from the Azure Pricing Calculator, default: 0.10

parameters.name: resourceGroup
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| where id == "{Workspace}"
| project resourceGroup

parameters.name: GBperday
parameters.description: Shows Average per Day over selected Duration (GB)
parameters.query:
Usage
| where TimeGenerated > startofday({TimeRange:start}) and TimeGenerated < startofday({TimeRange:end})
// Only look at chargeable Tables
| where IsBillable == True
| summarize
TotalBytes =round(sum(Quantity))
by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)
| summarize GBperday = round(avg(TotalBytes)/1000,2)

parameters.name: GBtotal
parameters.query:
Usage
| where StartTime {TimeRange:value}
| where IsBillable == True
| parse ResourceUri with *'/subscriptions/' SubscriptionId '/resourcegroups/'*
| where SubscriptionId == '{Subscription:id}'
| summarize Gbytes = sum(Quantity)/1000  by SubscriptionId
| project TotalGBytes = round(Gbytes,2)

parameters.name: SentinelCap
discountRate
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' 
| where id has "{Workspace}"
| extend sku = tolower(properties.sku.name)
| extend capacityReservationLevel = properties.sku.capacityReservationLevel
// add fake level for testing
//| extend capacityReservationLevel = 2000 , sku = "capacityreservation"
| extend discountRate = case(
capacityReservationLevel == 100,50,
capacityReservationLevel == 200,55,
capacityReservationLevel == 300,57,
capacityReservationLevel == 400,58,
capacityReservationLevel == 500,60,
capacityReservationLevel == 1000,61,
capacityReservationLevel == 2000,63,
capacityReservationLevel >= 5000,65,
// else
0
)
| project discountRate

parameters.name: lawCap
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' 
| where id has "{Workspace}"
| project capacityReservationLevel = properties.sku.capacityReservationLevel

parameters.name: SentinelSku
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' 
| where id has "{Workspace}"
| project sku = tolower(properties.sku.name)

content.query:
union withsource=TableName1 * | where TimeGenerated < ago(90d) | extend key = 'Key' | summarize size = sum(_BilledSize)/1024/1024/1024 by key
| project ['Data over 90 days'] = size, ['Retention Cost'] = size*{Retention}
content.title: Data older than 90 days and resulting retention cost
content.noDataMessage: You have no data older than 90 days

content.query:
union withsource = tt *
| where TimeGenerated > startofday({TimeRange:start}) and TimeGenerated < startofday({TimeRange:end})
// Only look at chargeable Tables
| where _IsBillable == True
| summarize TotalGBytes =round(sum(_BilledSize/(1024*1024*1024)),2) by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d)//, Solution=tt
| summarize ['GBs/day'] =round(avg(TotalGBytes),2)
content.title: Average billable GBs/day ingested in the last {TimeRange}

content.query:
Usage
| where IsBillable == true
| summarize size = sum(Quantity)/1024 by IsBillable
| project ['Total data ingestion'] = size, ['Estimated cost'] = size*{SentinelPrice}
content.title: Total billable ingestion and cost in the last {TimeRange}

content.query:
let Categories = datatable(Type:string,Category:string)
[
"AuditLogs" , "Azure Active Directory",
"SigninLogs" , "Azure Active Directory",
"AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs" , "Azure Active Directory",
"AADRiskyUsers" , "Azure Active Directory",
"AADRiskyServicePrincipals" , "Azure Active Directory",
"AADServicePrincipalRiskEvents" , "Azure Active Directory",
"ADFSSignInLogs" , "Azure Active Directory",
"NetworkAccessTraffic" , "Azure Active Directory",
"AADUserRiskEvents" , "Azure Active Directory",
"AADServicePrincipalSignInLogs" , "Azure Active Directory",
"AADManagedIdentitySignInLogs" , "Azure Active Directory",
"AADProvisioningLogs" , "Azure Active Directory",
"AZFWApplicationRule" , "Firewall",
"AZFWApplicationRuleAggregation" , "Firewall",
"AZFWDnsQuery" , "Firewall",
"AZFWIdpsSignature" , "Firewall",
"AZFWNatRule" , "Firewall",
"AZFWNatRuleAggregation" , "Firewall",
"AZFWNetworkRule" , "Firewall",
"AZFWNetworkRuleAggregation" , "Firewall",
"WindowsFirewall" , "Firewall",
"Event" , "Custom Events",
"BehaviorAnalytics" , "User Entity Behavior Analytics",
"UserPeerAnalytics" , "User Entity Behavior Analytics",
"UserAccessAnalytics" , "User Entity Behavior Analytics",
"IdentityInfo" , "User Entity Behavior Analytics",
"DeviceLogonEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint",
"DeviceEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint",
"DeviceNetworkInfo" , "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint",
"DeviceImageLoadEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint",
"DeviceFileEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint",
"DeviceInfo" , "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint",
"DeviceProcessEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint",
"DeviceNetworkEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint",
"DeviceRegistryEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint",
"DeviceFileCertificateInfo" , "Microsoft Defender for Endpoint",
"EmailAttachmentInfo" , "Microsoft Defender for Office 365",
"EmailEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Office 365",
"EmailPostDeliveryEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Office 365",
"EmailUrlInfo" , "Microsoft Defender for Office 365",
"IdentityLogonEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Identity",
"IdentityQueryEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Identity",
"IdentityDirectoryEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Identity",
"CloudAppEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps",
"AlertEvidence" , "Microsoft Defender Alert Evidence",
"InsightsMetrics" , "Azure Monitor for VMs",
"VMBoundPort" , "Azure Monitor for VMs",
"VMComputer" , "Azure Monitor for VMs",
"VMConnection" , "Azure Monitor for VMs",
"VMProcess" , "Azure Monitor for VMs",
"SecurityEvent" , "Windows Security Events",
"StorageBlobLogs" , "Azure Storage",
"StorageFileLogs" , "Azure Storage",
"Syslog" , "Syslog/CEF",
"SecurityIoTRawEvent" , "IoT Logs",
"CommonSecurityLog" , "Syslog/CEF",
"ThreatIntelligenceIndicator" , "Sentinel",
"DnsEvents" , "DNS Logs",
"DnsInventory" , "DNS Logs",
"AWSCloudTrail" , "AWS Logs",
"AWSVPCFlow" , "AWS Logs",
"ConfigurationChange" , "Change Tracking",
"ConfigurationData" , "Change Tracking",
"AzureDiagnostics" , "Azure Resources",
"AzureActivity" , "Azure Resources",
"LAQueryLogs" , "Management",
"SentinelHealth" , "Sentinel",
"Perf" , "Performance",
"AzureMetrics" , "Azure Metrics",
"SecurityNestedRecommendation" , "Microsoft Defender for Cloud",
"SecurityRecommendation" , "Microsoft Defender for Cloud",
"SecurityRegulatoryCompliance" , "Microsoft Defender for Cloud",
"SecureScoreControls" , "Microsoft Defender for Cloud",
"SecurityBaseline" , "Microsoft Defender for Cloud",
"SecureScores" , "Microsoft Defender for Cloud",
"Update" , "Update Management",
"UpdateSummary" , "Update Management",
"DeviceTvmSecureConfigurationAssessment" , "Microsoft Defender Vuln. Management",
"DeviceTvmSoftwareVulnerabilities" , "Microsoft Defender Vuln. Management",
"DeviceTvmSoftwareInventory" , "Microsoft Defender Vuln. Management",
"UrlClickEvents" , "Microsoft Defender for Office 365",
"SecurityBaselineSummary" , "Microsoft Defender for Cloud",
"AZFWThreatIntel" , "Firewall",
"AWSGuardDuty" , "AWS Logs",
"Watchlist" , "Sentinel",
"HuntingBookmark" , "Sentinel",
"SentinelAudit" , "Sentinel",
"Operation" , "Log Management",
"StorageTableLogs" , "Azure Storage",
"AddonAzureBackupStorage" , "Azure Storage",
"AddonAzureBackupPolicy" , "Azure Storage",
"StorageQueueLogs" , "Azure Storage",
"AddonAzureBackupProtectedInstance" , "Azure Storage",
"AddonAzureBackupJobs" , "Azure Storage"
];
let customTables = Usage
| where IsBillable == true
| where DataType contains "_CL"
| summarize size = sum(Quantity)/1024 by DataType
| project ['Log Type'] = "Custom Log",['Table'] = DataType, ['Table Size'] = size, ['Estimated cost'] = size*4.3;
let AzDiagTables = AzureDiagnostics
| summarize TotalIngestBytes=sum(_BilledSize) by Category
| project ['Log Type'] = "AzureDiagnostics", ['Table'] = Category ,['Table Size'] = TotalIngestBytes/1024000000 , ['Estimated cost'] = (TotalIngestBytes/1024000000 ) * 4.3;
let knownTables = Usage
| where IsBillable == true 
| where DataType <> "AzureDiagnostics"
| join kind=leftouter Categories on $left.DataType == $right.Type
| summarize size =sumif(Quantity, isnotempty(Category))/1024, sizeOther= sumif(Quantity,(isempty(Category) and DataType !contains "_CL"))/1024 by Category, DataType
| project ['Log Type'] = iif(isnotempty( Category),Category,"Other"), ['Table'] = DataType, ['Table Size'] = iif(isnotempty( Category),size,sizeOther), ['Estimated cost'] = iif(isnotempty(Category),size*4.3,sizeOther*4.3);
union customTables, knownTables, AzDiagTables
| sort by ['Estimated cost'] desc
content.title: Breakdown of billable ingestion by log category in the last {TimeRange}

content.json:
## Microsoft Sentinel benefit for Microsoft 365 E5, A5, F5 and G5 customers With security information and event management (SIEM) and extended detection and response (XDR) from Microsoft, you’re armed with the context and automation you need to stop sophisticated, cross-domain attacks across your entire organization. Microsoft 365 E5, A5, F5, G5 and Microsoft 365 E5, A5, F5, G5 Security customers can get data grant up to 5MB per user/day of Microsoft 365 data ingestion into Microsoft Sentinel.
The data sources included in this offer include: - Microsoft Entra ID (Azure AD) sign-in and audit logs - Microsoft Cloud App Security shadow IT discovery logs - Microsoft Information Protection logs - Microsoft 365 advanced hunting data The data grant will be calculated at the end of the month and applied to your bill, covering the cost of up to 5 MB of data ingestion per user/day. Visit https://azure.microsoft.com/offers/sentinel-microsoft-365-offer/ for more information
### Below are the ingestion for the eligible data sources: _**Note:** Kindly specify **Total seats (E5/A5/F5/G5)** and **Ingestion Price** parameters for calculation._

content.query:
Usage
| where IsBillable == true
| where DataType in ("SigninLogs", 
"AuditLogs", 
"AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs", 
"AADServicePrincipalSignInLogs",
"AADManagedIdentitySignInLogs",
"AADProvisioningLogs",
"ADFSSignInLogs",
"McasShadowItReporting", 
"InformationProtectionLogs_CL", 
"DeviceEvents",  
"DeviceFileEvents",  
"DeviceImageLoadEvents",  
"DeviceInfo",  
"DeviceLogonEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkInfo",  
"DeviceProcessEvents",  
"DeviceRegistryEvents",
"DeviceFileCertificateInfo",  
"EmailAttachmentInfo",  
"EmailEvents",  
"EmailPostDeliveryEvents",  
"EmailUrlInfo",
"IdentityLogonEvents",
"IdentityQueryEvents",
"IdentityDirectoryEvents",
"AlertEvidence",
"CloudAppEvents"
)   
| summarize BillableDataGB = sum(Quantity) / 1000. by DataType
| order by BillableDataGB desc

Usage
| where IsBillable == true
| where DataType in ("SigninLogs", 
"AuditLogs", 
"AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs", 
"AADServicePrincipalSignInLogs",
"AADManagedIdentitySignInLogs",
"AADProvisioningLogs",
"ADFSSignInLogs",
"McasShadowItReporting", 
"InformationProtectionLogs_CL", 
"DeviceEvents",  
"DeviceFileEvents",  
"DeviceImageLoadEvents",  
"DeviceInfo",  
"DeviceLogonEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkInfo",  
"DeviceProcessEvents",  
"DeviceRegistryEvents",
"DeviceFileCertificateInfo",  
"EmailAttachmentInfo",  
"EmailEvents",  
"EmailPostDeliveryEvents",  
"EmailUrlInfo",
"IdentityLogonEvents",
"IdentityQueryEvents",
"IdentityDirectoryEvents",
"AlertEvidence",
"CloudAppEvents")   
| summarize DailyIngestionGB = toreal(sum(Quantity))/ 1024  by format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yyyy-MM-dd') 
| extend MaxDataGrantGB  = ((5*toreal({TotalE5Seats}))/1024)
| sort by TimeGenerated asc

Usage
| where IsBillable == true
| where DataType in ("SigninLogs", 
"AuditLogs", 
"AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs", 
"AADServicePrincipalSignInLogs",
"AADManagedIdentitySignInLogs",
"AADProvisioningLogs",
"ADFSSignInLogs",
"McasShadowItReporting", 
"InformationProtectionLogs_CL", 
"DeviceEvents",  
"DeviceFileEvents",  
"DeviceImageLoadEvents",  
"DeviceInfo",  
"DeviceLogonEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkInfo",  
"DeviceProcessEvents",  
"DeviceRegistryEvents",
"DeviceFileCertificateInfo",  
"EmailAttachmentInfo",  
"EmailEvents",  
"EmailPostDeliveryEvents",  
"EmailUrlInfo",
"IdentityLogonEvents",
"IdentityQueryEvents",
"IdentityDirectoryEvents",
"AlertEvidence",
"CloudAppEvents"
)   
| summarize TotalBillableDataGB = sum(Quantity) / 1024
content.title: Total ingestion

content.query:
let DailyMaxDiscountGB  = ((5*toreal({TotalE5Seats}))/1024);
Usage
| where IsBillable == true
| where DataType in ("SigninLogs", 
"AuditLogs", 
"AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs", 
"AADServicePrincipalSignInLogs",
"AADManagedIdentitySignInLogs",
"AADProvisioningLogs",
"ADFSSignInLogs",
"McasShadowItReporting", 
"InformationProtectionLogs_CL", 
"DeviceEvents",  
"DeviceFileEvents",  
"DeviceImageLoadEvents",  
"DeviceInfo",  
"DeviceLogonEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkInfo",  
"DeviceProcessEvents",  
"DeviceRegistryEvents",
"DeviceFileCertificateInfo",  
"EmailAttachmentInfo",  
"EmailEvents",  
"EmailPostDeliveryEvents",  
"EmailUrlInfo",
"IdentityLogonEvents",
"IdentityQueryEvents",
"IdentityDirectoryEvents",
"AlertEvidence",
"CloudAppEvents")   
| summarize DailyBillableGB = toreal(sum(Quantity))/ 1024  by format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yy-MM-dd') 
| extend DailyMaxGrantGB = DailyMaxDiscountGB
| summarize MaxDataGrantGB = sum(toreal(DailyMaxGrantGB))
content.title: Total Data Grant Limit

content.query:
let DailyMaxDiscountGB  = ((5*toreal({TotalE5Seats}))/1024);
Usage
| where IsBillable == true
| where DataType in ("SigninLogs", 
"AuditLogs", 
"AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs", 
"AADServicePrincipalSignInLogs",
"AADManagedIdentitySignInLogs",
"AADProvisioningLogs",
"ADFSSignInLogs",
"McasShadowItReporting", 
"InformationProtectionLogs_CL", 
"DeviceEvents",  
"DeviceFileEvents",  
"DeviceImageLoadEvents",  
"DeviceInfo",  
"DeviceLogonEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkInfo",  
"DeviceProcessEvents",  
"DeviceRegistryEvents",
"DeviceFileCertificateInfo",  
"EmailAttachmentInfo",  
"EmailEvents",  
"EmailPostDeliveryEvents",  
"EmailUrlInfo",
"IdentityLogonEvents",
"IdentityQueryEvents",
"IdentityDirectoryEvents",
"AlertEvidence",
"CloudAppEvents")   
| summarize DailyBillableGB = toreal(sum(Quantity))/ 1024  by format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yy-MM-dd') 
| summarize TotalEligibleGB = sum(iif(toreal(DailyBillableGB)>toreal(DailyMaxDiscountGB),toreal(DailyMaxDiscountGB),DailyBillableGB))
content.title: Total Data Grant Used

content.query:
let DailyMaxDiscountGB  = ((5*toreal({TotalE5Seats}))/1024);
Usage
| where IsBillable == true
| where DataType in ("SigninLogs", 
"AuditLogs", 
"AADNonInteractiveUserSignInLogs", 
"AADServicePrincipalSignInLogs",
"AADManagedIdentitySignInLogs",
"AADProvisioningLogs",
"ADFSSignInLogs",
"McasShadowItReporting", 
"InformationProtectionLogs_CL", 
"DeviceEvents",  
"DeviceFileEvents",  
"DeviceImageLoadEvents",  
"DeviceInfo",  
"DeviceLogonEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkEvents",  
"DeviceNetworkInfo",  
"DeviceProcessEvents",  
"DeviceRegistryEvents",
"DeviceFileCertificateInfo",  
"EmailAttachmentInfo",  
"EmailEvents",  
"EmailPostDeliveryEvents",  
"EmailUrlInfo",
"IdentityLogonEvents",
"IdentityQueryEvents",
"IdentityDirectoryEvents",
"AlertEvidence",
"CloudAppEvents")   
| summarize DailyBillableGB = toreal(sum(Quantity))/ 1024  by format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'yy-MM-dd') 
| summarize TotalEligibleGB = sum(iif(toreal(DailyBillableGB)>toreal(DailyMaxDiscountGB),toreal(DailyMaxDiscountGB),DailyBillableGB))
| extend TotalDiscount = toreal(TotalEligibleGB)*{SentinelPrice}
| project TotalDiscount
content.title: Estimated Saving

content.json: **Daily ingestion size (for eligible data sources) vs Maximum data grant:**

## SOAR summary

In this section, you can view billable information regarding your Logic Apps. The data is based on Logic Apps' built-in metrics. To view the list of Logic Apps click the ">" icon in the subscription column.

You can change the default Logic App execution cost in the parameter below.

To see the approximate cost of your logic apps, **click on any subscription on the table below**.

For more billable information, visit: https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/logic-apps/

parameters.name: Subscription
parameters.label: Subscriptions
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type in~ ({ResourceTypes})
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = subscriptionId, label = subscriptionId, selected = Rank == 1

parameters.name: ResourceGroups
parameters.label: Resource groups
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type in~ ({ResourceTypes})
| summarize Count = count() by subscriptionId, resourceGroup
| order by Count desc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup), label = resourceGroup, selected = false

parameters.name: Resources
parameters.label: Logic Apps
parameters.query:
Resources
| where type in~({ResourceTypes})
| extend resourceGroupId = strcat('/subscriptions/', subscriptionId, '/resourceGroups/', resourceGroup)
| where resourceGroupId in~({ResourceGroups}) or '*' in~({ResourceGroups})
| order by name asc
| extend Rank = row_number()
| project value = id, label = tostring(name), selected = Rank <= 10, group = resourceGroup

content.title: Click on a subscription below to calculate the estimated automation costs
Estimated Logic App execution cost over the last {TimeRange}

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces' 
| where id has "{Workspace}"
| extend sku = tolower(properties.sku.name)
| extend capacityReservationLevel = properties.sku.capacityReservationLevel
// add fake level for testing
//| extend capacityReservationLevel = 5000 , sku = "capacityreservation"
//
| extend pricingTier = case(
sku == 'capacityreservation' and capacityReservationLevel == 100,
'100 GB/day Commitment Tier',
sku == 'capacityreservation' and capacityReservationLevel == 200,
'200 GB/day Commitment Tier',
sku == 'capacityreservation' and capacityReservationLevel == 300,
'300 GB/day Commitment Tier',
sku == 'capacityreservation' and capacityReservationLevel == 400,
'400 GB/day Commitment Tier',
sku == 'capacityreservation' and capacityReservationLevel == 500,
'500 GB/day Commitment Tier',
sku == 'capacityreservation' and capacityReservationLevel == 1000,
'1000 GB/day Commitment Tier',
sku == 'capacityreservation' and capacityReservationLevel == 2000,
'2000 GB/day Commitment Tier',
sku == 'capacityreservation' and capacityReservationLevel >= 5000,
'5000 GB/day and above Commitment Tier',
sku == 'free',
'Free',
sku == 'standard',
'Standard',
sku == 'premium',
'Premium',
sku == 'standalone',
'Standalone',
sku == 'pernode',
'Per Node',
sku == 'lacluster',
'Cluster Level Capacity Reservation',
sku == 'pergb2018' or sku == 'pergb',
'Pay-as-you-go',
strcat('Unknown:',sku))
| extend discountRate = case(
capacityReservationLevel == 100,50,
capacityReservationLevel == 200,55,
capacityReservationLevel == 300,57,
capacityReservationLevel == 400,58,
capacityReservationLevel == 500,60,
capacityReservationLevel == 1000,61,
capacityReservationLevel == 2000,63,
capacityReservationLevel >= 5000,65,
// else
0
)
| extend retentionInSentinel = iif({retentionDays} > 90,({retentionDays} -90) * {GBperday} * {Retention} ,toreal(0))
| project ['Workspace Name']=id,  location, sku, commitmentTier = capacityReservationLevel, discountRate ,  tags, dataRetention = {retentionDays}, dataRetentionMinusFree = {retentionDays}-90, RetentionEstimatedPrice = retentionInSentinel

Usage
| where IsBillable == True
| summarize dataPerDay = sum(Quantity)/1000  by bin(TimeGenerated,1d), SentinelCT='{SentinelCap}'
| extend higherCT = case(
                   dataPerDay < 100, 100,
                   dataPerDay > 100  and dataPerDay < 200, 200,
                   dataPerDay > 200  and dataPerDay < 300, 300,
                   dataPerDay > 300  and dataPerDay < 400, 400,
                   dataPerDay > 400  and dataPerDay < 500, 500,
                   dataPerDay > 500  and dataPerDay < 1000, 1000,
                   dataPerDay > 1000 and dataPerDay < 10000, 10000,
                   dataPerDay > 2000 and dataPerDay < 20000, 20000,
                   dataPerDay > 5000 and dataPerDay < 50000, 50000,
                   // else
                   0
                   )
//| extend lowerCT= (higherCT - 100)
content.title: Actual Data Volume and Commitment Tier.  Data from: {TimeRange:label}.

content.json:
### Commitment Tier Insight
This report, shows the Average GB/day (based on the TimeRange parameter), which is rounded up to the nearest whole number, this is the number the Azure Pricing Calculator requires. https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/calculator/ for Sentinel.
- The Pay as You Go (PAYG_estimate) is the GB/day multiplied by the [Sentinel Price] parameter, default is 2.0 (the price in $ for EAST US).  This is location and currency neutral, so adjust to your own preferred value.  This is the Daily estimate of the price.
- The Pay as You Go (PAYG_estimate_mthly) is the Monthly (31day) estimate of the price.
- Commitment Tier_Estimate_Monthly is the (PAYG_estimate_mthly) minus any discount for the commitment Tier that is *currently* set.
- Data ingested into Sentinel exceeding the selected daily commitment tier is charged at the effective tier prices. source: https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/azure-sentinel/

content.query:
project actual_ = '{GBperday}' , roundUp_ = round(toreal('{GBperday}'),0)
| extend lookBack = 31
| extend roundUp_ = iif(isnan(roundUp_),toreal(0),toreal(roundUp_))
| extend PAYG_estimate = roundUp_ * {SentinelPrice}
| extend discountRate = iif(isempty('{discountRate}'),"0",'{discountRate}')    
| extend PAYG_estimate_mthly = (PAYG_estimate * lookBack)
| extend CT_estimate_mthly = PAYG_estimate_mthly * tolong(discountRate) / 100
| summarize by ['avg GB/day']=roundUp_, PAYG_estimate, PAYG_estimate_mthly, CT_estimate_mthly
content.title: Commitment Tier. Price per GB:{CommitmentTierPrice},  Discount: {discountRate}%

content.json:
### Commitment Tier for your Average GB/day value?  
This report helps you decide:
- A green circle in a Status column 🟢 indicates your are on the Optimal setting, based on your average data ingestion (GB/day) and Pay As You Go/commitment tier settings.
- A recommend value of "0" / zero, means that you are on a setting (SKU) such as Free, PerGB etc.. rather than a commitment tier setting.
- If the 'recommend' Sentinel or Workspace setting doesn't match the 'current' setting you will get a Red Cross in the Status columns ❌.
- Please read https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/azure-sentinel/ and https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/monitor/ before deciding.

content.query:
project actual_ = '{GBperday}' , roundUp_ = round(toreal('{GBperday}'),0)
| extend lookBack = 31
| extend i = roundUp_ //* 100
| extend i = iif(isnan(i),toreal(0),toreal(i))
// Sentinel commitment tier logic
| extend recommendedSentinelCT = case(
    i  <= 50,"0",
    i between (51 .. 180),"100",
    i between (181 .. 286),"200",
    i between (287 .. 390),"300",
    i between (391 .. 476),"400",
    i between (477 .. 975),"500",
    i between (976 .. 1897),"1000",
    i between (1898 .. 4729),"2000",
    i >= 4730 ,"5000",
    //else
    strcat("unknown Sentinel CT: ", i)
)
// Azure Log Analytics (LAW) commitment tier logic
| extend recommendedWorkspaceCT = case(
    i <= 85,"0",
    i between (86 .. 187),"100",
    i between (188 .. 293),"200",
    i between (294 .. 391),"300",
    i between (392 .. 491),"400",
    i between (492 .. 982),"500",
    i between (983 .. 1952),"1000",
    i between (1953 .. 4849),"2000",
    i >= 4850 ,"5000",
    //else
    strcat("unknown LAW CT: ", i)
)
| extend avgDataPerDay = i
| extend currentSentinelCT = iif(isempty('{SentinelCap}'),"0",'{SentinelCap}')
| extend currentWorkspaceCT = iif(isempty('{lawCap}'),"0",'{lawCap}')
| extend sentinelOptimal = iif(recommendedSentinelCT == currentSentinelCT,1,0)
| extend lawOptimal = iif(recommendedWorkspaceCT == currentWorkspaceCT,1,0)
| summarize by ['avg GB/day']=avgDataPerDay,['Sentinel Status']=sentinelOptimal, ['Log Analytics Status']=lawOptimal, recommendedSentinelCT, recommendedWorkspaceCT,currentSentinelCT, currentWorkspaceCT
content.title: Commitment Tier Recommendations

tooltipFormat.tooltip: If Current and Recommended settings dont match the avg. GB/day - look to adjust?
If Current and Recommended settings dont match the avg. GB/day - look to adjust?
